# Methods

## MHW calculations

## Slide with speaker notes

- climatology was derived for each week based on average (and variance of) temperatures from `r ref_years[1]` to `r rev(ref_years)[1]`. 
- MHW categories were determined as: Category 1 = 1 SD, Category 2 = 2 SD, etc.
